verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: gave] [ARG1: a speech] and took questions after meeting with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] gave a speech and [V: took] [ARG1: questions] [ARGM-TMP: after meeting with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] gave a speech and took questions after [V: meeting] [ARG1: with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] .
